statements: SELECT * FROM SpecialEducationSchedule WHERE therapist_id = 101;
SELECT student_id, session_date FROM SpecialEducationSchedule WHERE service_type = 'Speech Therapy';
SELECT location, therapist_id FROM SpecialEducationSchedule WHERE session_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM SpecialEducationSchedule WHERE location LIKE '%School%';
SELECT DISTINCT therapist_id FROM SpecialEducationSchedule ORDER BY therapist_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM SpecialEducationSchedule WHERE therapist_id = 101 ORDER BY session_date DESC, location ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_id, session_date, location FROM SpecialEducationSchedule WHERE location = 'School' AND service_type = 'Speech Therapy';
SELECT therapist_id, COUNT(*) as session_count FROM SpecialEducationSchedule GROUP BY therapist_id HAVING session_count > 10 ORDER BY session_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM SpecialEducationSchedule WHERE session_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' ORDER BY session_date ASC;
SELECT student_id, therapist_id, service_type FROM SpecialEducationSchedule WHERE student_id IN (101, 102, 103) AND location LIKE '%Library%' ORDER BY student_id ASC, therapist_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM support_services;
SELECT service_name, service_type FROM support_services WHERE service_type = 'Counseling';
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM support_services ORDER BY service_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM therapy_sessions WHERE session_date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT session_id, therapist_id, session_date, session_time FROM therapy_sessions WHERE student_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM support_services WHERE service_type = 'Counseling';
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM support_services WHERE service_id = 1;
SELECT session_id, student_id, session_date FROM therapy_sessions WHERE therapist_id = 101 ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM support_services WHERE service_type = 'Therapy' ORDER BY service_name ASC;
SELECT therapist_id, session_date FROM therapy_sessions WHERE student_id = 202 ORDER BY session_date, session_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM SupportServices;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM SupportServices WHERE support_staff_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM TherapySessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 10;
SELECT session_time, therapist_id FROM TherapySessions WHERE session_date = '2022-05-10';
SELECT * FROM SupportServices WHERE support_staff_id = 100;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM SupportServices WHERE service_id > 5 ORDER BY service_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE special_needs LIKE '%autism%' ORDER BY student_grade ASC;
SELECT session_date, session_time FROM TherapySessions WHERE therapist_id = 200 AND session_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT service_id, service_name FROM SupportServices JOIN TherapySessions ON SupportServices.service_id = TherapySessions.session_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT name, grade_level FROM Students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT therapist_id, name, expertise FROM Therapists ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT session_id, date, start_time, end_time FROM Sessions WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT service_name, description FROM Services WHERE therapist_id = 2 AND student_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE grade_level > 5;
SELECT name, grade_level FROM Students WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT therapist_id, expertise FROM Therapists WHERE expertise LIKE '%Counseling%';
SELECT service_name, description FROM Services WHERE therapist_id = 2 AND student_id = 4;
SELECT Sessions.date, Students.name, Therapists.name FROM Sessions JOIN Students ON Sessions.student_id = Students.student_id JOIN Therapists ON Sessions.therapist_id = Therapists.therapist_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT session_id, student_id, therapist_id, start_time, end_time FROM therapy_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT t.therapist_name, ts.session_date FROM therapists AS t INNER JOIN therapy_sessions AS ts ON t.therapist_id = ts.therapist_id WHERE ts.session_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT s.student_name, ss.service_name FROM students AS s INNER JOIN student_services AS ss ON s.student_id = ss.student_id WHERE ss.service_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT therapist_name, specialty FROM therapists WHERE specialty = 'Mental Health';
SELECT student_name, grade_level, date_of_birth FROM students WHERE grade_level >= 10;
SELECT t.therapist_name, s.service_name FROM therapists t JOIN support_services s ON t.therapist_id = s.service_id;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(service_id) AS num_services FROM student_services GROUP BY student_id HAVING num_services > 2;
